infantry.description: Basic human military unit. Medium strength but slow.

police.description: Law enforcement unit. Weaker than infantry but available in greater numbers.

artillery.description: Long-range attack unit. Powerful but vulnerable and slow.

tank.description: Heavy military vehicle. High strength and decent mobility.

helicopter.description: Aerial unit. High mobility and can bypass obstacles.

populace.description: Civilian population. Very weak but worth protecting.

firemen.description: Fire control unit. Can extinguish fires in adjacent nodes.

fireboat.description: Waterborne fire control unit. Faster movement in water and more effective at extinguishing fires.
